about.top: We are a small, developing company, which is why we can offer you quality products and services. We specialize in the assembly of electronics and hydraulics for agricultural and forestry machinery. Our work includes workshop tasks (assembly) and field work (services). The advantage of our company is fast responsiveness.
about.bottom: We offer high-quality welding, assembly, and servicing of our products. For every piece of machinery, we strive to make it refined and tailored to your desires and needs. Innovation in our products is our hallmark.

varjenje.t2: We weld steels, inox, and structures.

montaza.t7: Assembly of tanks and pumps for petroleum derivatives for private customers

servis.t1: We are aware that only fast and professional assistance ensures efficient work with our products. Therefore, we also pay attention to after-sales cooperation.

lokacije_dela.t1: Currently, we are present in the following countries: Belgium, Netherlands, Germany, France, Slovenia, Croatia.

najem_bagrov.t2: Long-term or short-term rental. For more info, contact us.
